helpText: 试_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________验.

generic.title: 试_Error updating categories__________________________验
generic.message: 试_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________验.

maxDepthExceeded.title: 试_Error updating categories__________________________验
maxDepthExceeded.message: 试_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________验.

destinationHasSameName.title: 试_Error updating categories__________________________验
destinationHasSameName.message: 试_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________验.

emptyTitle.title: 试_Error updating categories__________________________验
emptyTitle.message: 试_Category title cannot be empty_________________验.

noSchema.title: 试_Schema not found_________________验
noSchema.message: 试_Item schema not found for user_________________验.

maxCharacter.title: 试_Error updating categories__________________________验
maxCharacter.message: 试_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________验.

deleteInUseCategory.title: 试_Delete category________________验
deleteInUseCategory.message: 试_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________验.

custom.title: 试_Custom categories__________________验
custom.message: 试_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________验.

arcgis.title: 试_ArcGIS categories__________________验
arcgis.message: 试_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________验.

iso.title: 试_ISO categories_______________验
iso.message: 试_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________验.

inspire.title: 试_INSPIRE categories___________________验
inspire.message: 试_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________验.
